name: Tom Cruise
biography: Tom Cruise is an American actor and producer. He has received various accolades for his work, including three Golden Globe Awards and nominations for three Academy Awards. He is one of the highest-paid actors in the world.

name: Jason Statham
biography: Jason Statham is an English actor and film producer. Typecast as the antihero, he is known for his action-thriller roles and portraying tough, irredeemable, and machiavellian characters.

name: Donie Yen
biography: Donnie Yen Ji-dan is a Hong Kong actor, martial artist, film director, producer, action choreographer, and multiple-time world wushu tournament champion.
movies: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
